Description:
312400837 - LMCI/KA/310322/001 - You have failed to ensure that lifting equipment, in particular the vehicle lifts used in your business,  which are exposed to conditions causing deterioration and thus liable to result in dangerous situations  have been subject to regular 6 monthly or 12 monthly thorough examination by a competent person.

312400879 - LMCI/KA/310322/002 - You have failed to demonstrate your compressed air receiver (Model Number WRN7-5HP-2705, Serial  No. FP30232) is being examined in accordance with a written scheme of periodic examination by a  certified competent person to prevent danger and ensure the continued effective working of protective  devices.
Address: Garturk Street/Glasgow Autos L25 Garturk StreetGLASGOWG42 8JGScotland
